@nrk/nativebridge

Getting started

nativebridge

Use from npmjs.nrk.no

npm install @nrk/nativebridge --save
import nativebridge from '@nrk/nativebridge'

Use from static.nrk.no

<script src="https://static.nrk.no/nativebridge/X.X.X/nativebridge.min.js"></script> <!-- window.nativebridge is now defined -->

Use with require.js

require(['https://static.nrk.no/nativebridge/X.X.X/nativebridge.min.js'], function(nativebridge) { /* code here */ });

nativebridge support


iOS Safari
10.2+

Android
4.4.4+

Shortcuts

View on Github View latest release

Browser

Document tabindex="0", role="button", aria-expanded="false", FOUT, and lacking polyfill for details.open, make react-bridge

On receives from native

nativebridge.on('test', (data) => {})  // Bind handler to 'test' event emitted from native
nativebridge.on('*', (data) => {})     // Bind handler to all events emitted from native

Off

nativebridge.off('test')               // Unbind all handlers for 'test' event
nativebridge.off('test', (data) => {}) // Unbind specific handler for 'test' event

Emit send to native

nativebridge.emit('test', {            // Emit 'test' event with data to native
  foo: 'bar'
})
